title: Tutor - Mathematics and Science
details: Providing personalized tutoring with a focus on problem-solving and conceptual clarity. Currently tutoring a student in the Netherlands remotely, using virtual tools for interactive and engaging learning. I tutor students across different grade levels, including those in the science faculty, tailoring lessons to their needs. Through my guidance, students have improved their performance in exams, strengthening their understanding and confidence in the subjects. This experience enhances my communication, adaptability, and analytical skills, making me effective in collaborative environments.

title: Software Quality Assurance Tester
details: Performed manual testing on Hospital Management System, identifying 50+ critical bugs
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to troubleshoot system issues
Developed technical documentation and test cases
Enhanced system usability through rigorous UI/UX testing
